author: Sam-Harper
body:
#### PR description:
This is the adaption PR for https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26485 which was originally https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26389 (this PR is currently exactly the same as that PR just ordered). It contains all of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26485, I was not sure how to proceed here as it needs those changes.  This PR starts from commit https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/2a8a8bf5b61176328a121b3fa29f862dc7bff7eb. 

Testing on going once the first PR is tested. 

Relative to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/2648, there should be no change in output with the exception of the HEEP IDs which will suffer from rounding effects leading to a difference to trk isolation when now calculated using tracks rather than packed candidates.
title: Adapting VID & Nano to the new E/gamma UL format + adding HEEP V7.1
